p: In the District Court at Montesano, September Term A.D. 1888
Comes now Locrea Jr Hume in answer to the annexed writ of Habeas Corpus and makes of the same as follows

That she holds in her custody the said Hilma Lundvall and has so held her since the fifteenth day of July A.D. 1887 under and by orders of orticts of adoption between said Hume and the Orphan Home of the Presbyterian Church located at Portland in the State of Oregon and that he restrains said Hilma Ludvall of her liberty in no other manner
